meanings.definition: A person who is suffering or dying from lack of food.
meanings.sent1: The kind-hearted community came together to help the starvers in need.
meanings.sent2: The charity organization provided meals for the hungry starvers in the city.
meanings.sent3: The starvers decided to have a picnic, but forgot to bring any food!
meanings.sent4: In the land of plenty, the sight of starvers on the streets was a stark reminder of inequality.
meanings.sent5: The image of the emaciated starvers haunted the townspeople, urging them to take action.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are suffering or dying from lack of food.
meanings.sent1: The village rallied together to support the starving starvers during the harsh winter.
meanings.sent2: The news report highlighted the plight of the starving starvers in the war-torn region.
meanings.sent3: The starvers held a bake-off competition, but no one had any ingredients!
meanings.sent4: The image of the starving starvers painted a grim picture of the ongoing famine.
meanings.sent5: The community banded together to provide relief for the hungry starvers, showing true compassion.
